About Us

Learn more about us.

Tomasz Lekawa

Internationally published Photographer

Alicja Lekawa

(beauty cooperator)

Internationally published freelance Photomodel, Makeup Artist & Stylist

ATL Photography Ltd was created in 2021 by us, Alicja & Tomasz Lekawa. Our passion is to photograph people, create unique portraits and professional portfolios.Our work has been published in over 50 fashion, modeling and lifestyle magazines around the World. This includes our editorials published on the covers of magazines in New York, Paris and many more.

For more information about us, our work and publications, please visit our Portfolio website.

Portfolio

For more information about us and our work, please visit our personal portfolio website.

Portfolio

Pricing

Pick your perfect package

STANDARD PHOTOSHOOT

A standard photoshoot occurs when a photographed person or people wear the same outfit, makeup and hairstyle during the entire session. This type of photo session is the best choice for non-models who want to get beautiful images for their home photo album. Usually, the session lasts from 1 hour to 2 hours.

We require a £30.00 photo session date and time booking fee (non-refundable).

This package includes:
  • 10 fully edited digital images

£179.00 (inc. pre-paid £30.00)

This package includes:
  • 15 fully edited digital images

£229.00 (inc. pre-paid £30.00)

This package includes:
  • 20 fully edited digital images

£259.00 (inc. pre-paid £30.00)

PORTFOLIO

We build our portfolio by creating a number of unique photographs. This type of photoshoot usuallyconsists of a number of mini photo sessions where a model changes outfits, makeup and hairstyle.Then we select the best photos from the sets we did, and that is how your portfolio is created.This type of photo session is the best choice for aspiring models/photo models, semi-professional orprofessional models/photo models, influencers and anyone who wants to have their own portfolio. Duration: ranging from 3 hours to a full day

We require a 50% up-front fee.

This package includes:
  • 10 fully edited digital images
  • up to 10 different outfits (professional makeup included)

£399.00

This package includes:
  • 15 fully edited digital images
  • up to 15 different outfits (professional makeup included)

£549.00

This package includes:
  • 20 fully edited digital images
  • up to 20 different outfits (professional makeup included)

£649.00

SOCIAL MEDIA FEED PLANS

This plan gives you constant and regular photography content for your Facebook & Instagram. This is the best choice for influencers, models, photo models, social media business owners and anyone who wants to keep the social media feed at its most professional look. You will receive your final images in two packages. One is ready to use on Instagram, while the other is ready to use on Facebook.

We require a 50% up-front fee.

This package includes:

we will photograph you 4 times. One time in each season of the year to create a series of professional images for you to use on your Facebook & Instagram. Photoshoots are made in Summer, Autumn, Winter and Spring.

You pay just for 3 photoshoots (Standard or Portfolio).

This package includes:

we will photograph you 12 times a year, which means 1 photoshoot every month.

You pay just for 8 photoshoots (Standard or Portfolio).

PHOTOSHOOT TRIPS

(with your own Photographer and MUA, Stylist Team)

Trips are in a group of 4 to 6 models plus a Photographer, Make-up Artist and Stylist.

In the most popular cities like London, Manchester, Liverpool, Leeds, Birmingham, Edinburgh, etc.

From £299.00 per person (single day trips)-transport included

From £499.00 per person (weekend trips, two nights stay in at least a 3-star hotel)-transport & accommodation included

In Paris, Amsterdam or Brussels

we will photograph you 12 times a year, which means 1 photoshoot every month.

You pay just for 8 photoshoots (Standard or Portfolio).
